Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ<Hilda>、キミの持ってる そのカードって何？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, <Hilda>, what're those cards of yours?

Entry.JapaneseText: 占いのためのカードだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: These are cards used for fortunetelling.
Entry.Notes: Mao: Hey, <Hilda>, what are those cards you have?

Entry.JapaneseText: ずいぶん古いものみたいだけど、 誰かにもらったの？
Entry.EnglishText: They seem to be pretty old. Who gave them to you?
